title: Bolsonaro, in Defeat, May Now Face Charges
description: Brazil’s president has faced investigations that have been staved off or blocked so far given his presidential immunity. But that may now change of his defeat in Sunday’s election.
dc:creator: Flávia Milhorance
media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:description: Brazilian presidential candidate Jair Bolsonaro gestures to supporters in Rio de Janeiro on Thursday.
